name: ServiceNow-CICD-App-Publish
description: Installs the specified application from the application repository onto the local instance
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: scope
inputs.label: Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if sys_id is not specified. The scope of the application. You can locate this value in the scope field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: sysId
inputs.label: sys_id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if scope is not specified. The sys_id of the application to store in the repository. You can locate this value in the Sys ID field in the Custom Application [sys_app] table.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Version under which to store the application.
If the version number is passed, the publish process uses that version and updates the local application version if different. If the version number is not passed, the publish process uses the current version of the local application.

inputs.name: devNotes
inputs.label: Developer notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Developer notes to store with the application.
